name: Max Users per Team: Can't use invite link over max

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Max Users per Team
--------------------
1. Set Max Users to number of users on the current team, Save
2. Have a user not on the team try to join the team using an invite link
inline.testData: Won't fix (when max no. is reduced to fewer than current users on team, no need to notify in real time): https://mattermost.atlassian.net/browse/PLT-4091
inline.expectedResult: User sees error message below the Create Button on trying to save new account info: "This team has reached the maximum number of allowed accounts. Contact your systems administrator to set a higher limit."
